channel.title: PI [bow issue] ranged - please read updated!
channel.description:
this has to do with attacking npcs, when i am owner it is fine but when i am any other playerrights they run towards the monster and go melee range, i checked public int bows to make sure the bow was in there and it is.
i cant find where this has been changed i tried putting it source to source that has ranged working and cant find where they added this in to make it go melee range.
thanks for any help
edit: big edit!!!
i just found out it works for everyone btu first i need to fire a crossbow than regular shortbows work and throwingg items.... any fix for this? so it dont matter if i fire crossbow first or now
the item must be rune c'bow for it to work regular
